values: 推迟；延期；延迟；展缓；搁置；延缓；把…放在次要地位；使延后发生

synonym.mean: 使…延期；把…放在次要地位；把…放在后面

sample.mean: adj. 研究生的；研究生课程的
adj. 死后的；身后的；死后出版的；父亲死后出生的；遗腹的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指暂时中断以待某种条件的实现。
正式用词，语气强于postpone，多指故意拖延。
正式用词，语气较强，多指有安排的延期，常指明延期到一定的时间。
指把时间延长至超过正常或通常的限度。
普通用词，多指因外界原因推迟或耽误，也可指有意推迟。
口语用词，与postpone同义，但较通俗。

bilingual.target: 不要回避或者延缓任何任务。

bilingual.source: The result suggested that low temperature could postpone the appearance of browning.
bilingual.target: 低温可有效的延缓果心褐变的发生.

bilingual.source: It is advisable to postpone important decisions until the depression has lifted.
bilingual.target: 延缓做出重要决定直到抑郁消散是明智的。

bilingual.source: E. Although a winner can freely enjoy himself, he can also postpone enjoyment.
bilingual.target: 成功者可以自由自在地享受人生，他还可以延缓这种享受。

bilingual.source: The week before and after the lunar eclipse is a time to postpone important decisions.
bilingual.target: 在月蚀的前一周和后一周是延缓重要决定的时间。

bilingual.source: Although a winner can freely enjoy himself, he can also postpone enjoyment.
bilingual.target: 对于成功者而言,即使他能随时放松自己, 他还可以延缓这种享受.

bilingual.source: The result indicated that coated fertilizer could postpone the release time of fertilizer than ordinary fertilizer.
bilingual.target: 表明包膜肥比普通肥料能够延缓肥料的释放时间。

bilingual.source: The growth speed of the ethnic minority population can promote (or postpone) the economic development of these regions.
bilingual.target: 民族人口增长速度的快慢又能促进或延缓地区经济的发展。

bilingual.source: It can not only cure the disease , but also postpone caducity and strengthen the body.
bilingual.target: 医疗按摩是祖国传统医学中一朵奇葩，它不仅能够治疗疾病，而且能延缓衰老强身健体。

bilingual.source: It can not only cure the disease, but also postpone caducity and strengthen the body.
bilingual.target: 医疗按摩是祖国传统医学中一朵奇葩,它不仅能够治疗疾病, 而且能延缓衰老强身健体.

yingyinNormal.en: Am I? And was it your idea to postpone the wedding? I'm gonna go to the bathroom. Wait up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗？是你提议把婚期延后的？我要上厕所。等我。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, Your Honor. Would it be okay if we postpone this for now for just a little while? Would that be okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 对不起，法官大人，如果可以我想延期审理可以吗?

yingyinNormal.en: You're gonna find a place. But even if God forbid you didn't, so you postpone the wedding. Is that really so bad?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们会找到场地的，就算找不到，那就延期嘛，有那么糟糕吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I know what you're going to say. I made a commitment to Bernadette and to your family and I've got a hell of a lot of nerve coming in here and demanding that we postpone this thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你想说什么，我已对伯纳黛特和您家作出承诺，我鼓起万般勇气来到这里提出延期的要求实在是太过分了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: cause or arrange for something to take place at a time later than that first scheduled

sample.mean: adj. 研究生的；研究生课程的
adj. 死后的；身后的；死后出版的；父亲死后出生的；遗腹的

word_usage.usage: postpone作及物动词，其后可接名词、代词或者动名词（doing的形式），如：postpone building the new hospital，不能接动词不定式（to do的形式）。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“推迟、使……延期”，常指人为的推迟。
意为“耽搁、延误、延期”，常指因外界因素而拖延。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: cause or arrange for something to take place at a time later than that first scheduled

examination_example.sentence: It was <highlight>postponed</highlight> to the following day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 会议推迟到第二天举行。

examination_example.sentence: Why did Berlin <highlight>postpone</highlight> the opening of its dream airport again and again?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么柏林一再推迟其梦想中的机场的开放？

examination_example.sentence: To allow them to <highlight>postpone</highlight> their monthly mortgage payments.

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

sense_info_list.en: cause or arrange for something to take place at a time later than that first scheduled

examination_example.sentence: "It's been <highlight>postponed</highlight> until 2017," says Anna Somers, the founder and CEO of The Art Newspaper and the former head of Venice in Peril, a group devoted to restoring Venetian art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Anna Somers，《艺术报》(the Art Newspaper)的创始人兼首席执行官(CEO)，也是致力于恢复威尼斯艺术的威尼斯危机组织(Venice in Peril)的前负责人，她说，“这已被推迟到2017年。”
